chunks.title: CSS Selectors MasterClass  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: Guys, we talked about Selectors in CSS and we said that

chunks.title: CSS Selectors MasterClass  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: Selectors are used to select any element which has a style applied.

chunks.title: CSS Selectors MasterClass  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: Now how can we apply style on any type of element and how can we select those elements?

chunks.title: CSS Selectors MasterClass  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: For example, Element with an ID, Element with a class, we can target the element by its name.

chunks.title: CSS Selectors MasterClass  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: And we can also decide that if a particular type of element is applied in a particular type of element, then it is applied.

chunks.title: CSS Selectors MasterClass  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: I will explain the rules of applying this styling in this video and I will explain the Selectors.
